item.title: 第一量子公司将缩减巴拿马铜矿停工时间
item.description: 工会表示，第一量子矿业有限公司（First Quantum Minerals Ltd.）正在缩减其巴拿马停产铜矿的工作时间，以控制去年关闭令之后的矿场维护成本。【原文：First Quantum Minerals Ltd. is trimming working hours at its stalled copper mine in Panama in a bid to rein in the cost of preserving the site following last year’s shutdown order, the union said.】

item.title: 交易员开始兑现对美联储大幅降息的押注
item.description: 由于期货和期权市场的交易商兑现了他们对美联储今年积极降息的押注，美国国债面临进一步抛售的风险。【原文：US Treasuries are at risk of a further selloff as traders in the futures and options markets cash in on their bets for aggressive Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 下一页 法院驳回液化天然气许可申请后，十年公司股价暴跌
item.description: NextDecade 公司的股价暴跌达 20%，创下一年多来的最大跌幅，原因是法院裁定该公司在得克萨斯州的液化天然气出口综合设施的联邦监管许可被驳回。【原文：NextDecade Corp.’s share price tumbled as much as 20%, the biggest plunge in more than a year, after a court ruling that struck down the company’s federal regulatory permit for its liquefied natural gas export complex in Texas.】

item.title: 局势动荡，VIX 基金卷土重来，单日涨幅达 84
item.description: 对股市剧烈波动下注的 ETF 又开始流行起来；在本周的快速下跌和回升过程中，ETF 有大涨也有大跌。【原文：ETFs that place bets on severe stock-market swings are coming back into vogue — delivering big gains and losses during this week’s rapid downturn and recovery.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称特朗普胜算上升将提振美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师表示，即使共和党的目标是抵消美元的强势，但今年晚些时候共和党当选总统的可能性增加也会提振美元。【原文：An increased potential for a Republican president later this year stands to boost the US dollar even if the party aims to offset the currency’s strength, according to Morgan Stanley analysts.】

item.title: Airbnb 因前景疲软而暴跌，预示美国需求放缓
item.description: Airbnb 公司连续第三个季度的业绩展望令人失望，并警告说美国游客的需求放缓，这表明即使在夏季旅游旺季，旅游消费的势头也将继续减弱，因此该公司股价暴跌。【原文：Shares of Airbnb Inc. tumbled after the company gave a disappointing outlook for a third consecutive quarter and warned of slowing demand from US travelers — a sign that momentum in travel spending will continue to taper off even during the peak summer season.】

item.title: Vista 以主导私人市场为由关闭对冲基金
item.description: Vista Equity Partners 已告知投资者，在市场向私人资产发生 "结构性转变 "的背景下，该公司将关闭其对冲基金。【原文：Vista Equity Partners has told investors it’s winding down its hedge fund amid a “structural shift” in markets toward private assets.】

item.title: 对冲基金在 "可怕 "的清盘后重新投向加密货币看涨期权
item.description: 加密货币交易商在上周末经历了今年最严重的一次看涨头寸清算后，几乎立即又在期权市场上投入了乐观的赌注。【原文：Crypto traders are piling back into optimistic bets in the options market almost immediately after one of the worst liquidations of bullish positions this year over the weekend.】

item.title: 市场震荡给繁忙的夏季股票销售带来冲击
item.description: 最近的股市动荡有可能给夏季火爆的美股销售踩下刹车。【原文：The recent bout of stock-market turbulence threatens to put the brakes on what had been a brisk summer for US share sales.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空就可能的 27.5 亿美元债务交易向投资者发出邀请
item.description: 美国捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways Corp.【原文：JetBlue Airways Corp. has held talks with lenders for a potential $2.75 billion debt offering that would be backed by its loyalty program, making it the latest carrier to undertake such an deal.】

item.title: 对冲基金在科技股大跌前已遭受损失
item.description: 7 月中旬，股市暴跌，全球最大的一些股票对冲基金因投资于领跌的热门科技股而损失了数亿美元。【原文：As a stock rout hit markets mid-July, some of the world’s biggest equity hedge funds lost hundreds of millions of dollars from piling into popular tech stocks that led the meltdown.】

item.title: 赤道几内亚称与 Trafigura 就 20 亿美元石油融资举行会谈
item.description: 赤道几内亚称，该国与 Trafigura 集团举行了会谈，商讨从该大宗商品贸易商处融资 20 亿美元的可能性，以支持该国油气行业的发展。【原文：Equatorial Guinea says it held talks with Trafigura Group for the possibility of $2 billion in financing from the commodity trader to support development of the nation’s hydrocarbon sector.】

item.title: 解开大跌之谜的更多信息
item.description:
野村的查理-麦克利戈特（Charlie McElligott）解释了波动性的回归。【原文：

Nomura's Charlie McElligott explains the return of volatility.

】

item.title: 销售额突破 1 万亿美元，美国企业债台高筑
item.description: 企业借款人正在以 2020 年以来最快的速度出售投资级债券，因为企业利用收益率较低的机会在 11 月大选前发行债务。【原文：Corporate borrowers are selling investment-grade bonds at the fastest clip since 2020 as companies take advantage of lower yields to issue debt before the November election.】

item.title: 埃及希望在小麦价格接近四年低点时大量采购小麦
item.description: 埃及正在利用当前小麦价格下跌的机会，一次性购买其全年需求量的近三分之一。【原文：Egypt is taking advantage of the current dip in wheat prices to buy up nearly a third of its yearly requirement of the grain in one go.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购机制使用量降至 3,000 亿美元以下
item.description: 自 2021 年以来，投资者在美联储主要机构停放的资金首次降至 3,000 亿美元以下。【原文：The amount of money investors park at a major Federal Reserve facility dropped below $300 billion for the first time since 2021.】

item.title: 石油交易商在暴跌后大举抛售原油
item.description: 过去一周，随着股市暴跌在市场上引起反响，依赖趋势跟踪算法的石油交易商迅速转为看跌，据跟踪这些投资者的公司称，他们的大部分抛售可能已经完成。【原文：Oil traders that rely on trend-following algorithms have rapidly turned bearish over the past week as a plunge in equities reverberated across markets, and the bulk of their selling may already be completed, according to firms that track those investors.】

item.title: 最大的隔夜股票交易场所在波动后暂停交易
item.description: 美国最大的专用隔夜交易场所因陷入全球市场波动而被迫停止股票交易。【原文：The largest dedicated overnight trading venue in the US was forced to halt stock trading after getting caught up in global market volatility.】

item.title: 佛罗里达富裕的繁荣小镇借钱修复被飓风摧毁的码头
item.description: 佛罗里达州那不勒斯市正在求助于市政债券市场，重建被飓风伊恩肆虐的著名码头，这至少是该市因极端天气破坏而进行的第五次重建。【原文：Naples, Florida, is turning to the municipal bond market to rebuild its famous pier ravaged by Hurricane Ian, marking its at least its fifth reconstruction because of extreme weather damage.】

item.title: 都铎校友达梅什-马尼亚尔将关闭其宏观对冲基金
item.description: 达梅什-马尼亚尔（Dharmesh Maniyar）正在关闭他的对冲基金，因为在提出赎回要求后，他管理的资产不断减少。【原文：Dharmesh Maniyar is shutting down his hedge fund because of declining assets under management after redemption requests.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金买入周一美股跌势
item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：As volatility gripped global markets to start the week, hedge funds stepped in to buy the big dip in technology shares, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s prime brokerage data.】

item.title: 奥地利推选劳工部长马丁-科切尔接替霍尔茨曼出任欧洲央行行长
item.description: 奥地利劳动和经济部长马丁-科切尔（Martin Kocher）将接替罗伯特-霍尔茨曼（Robert Holzmann）执掌奥地利央行。【原文：Austrian Labor and Economy Minister Martin Kocher is set to succeed Robert Holzmann at the helm of the central bank.】

item.title: 高风险借款人发现债券和贷款市场的大门正在关闭
item.description: 全球市场的动荡正威胁着夏季债务繁荣的终结，而夏季债务繁荣帮助一些风险最高的美国公司削减了借贷成本，推迟了到期日，甚至推迟了利息支付。【原文：The turmoil in global markets is threatening to end a summer debt boom that helped some of the riskiest US companies cut borrowing costs, push out maturities and even defer interest payments.】

item.title: 伊朗处决被控杀害伊斯兰革命卫队军官的抗议者
item.description: 据国营 Mizan Online 报道，一名男子在参加伊朗 2022 年全国起义后被捕，后被指控在抗议活动中杀害了一名伊斯兰革命卫队成员，他已于周二被处决。【原文：A man who was arrested after he took part in Iran’s nationwide 2022 uprising and later accused of killing a member of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps during the protests was executed on Tuesday, state-run Mizan Online reported.】

item.title: 市场动荡加剧美联储和同行缓和立场的压力
item.description: 在这一年里，各国央行一直在权衡通胀率过高的风险和经济陷入衰退的可能性，现在决策者们需要考虑一个新的动态因素：动荡的金融市场。【原文：In a year that’s seen central banks weighing the risk of inflation staying too high against the chance of tipping economies into recession, policymakers now have a fresh dynamic to consider: volatile financial markets.】

item.title: 贪污成风的保加利亚为何无法停止选举
item.description: 8 月初，建立执政联盟的谈判破裂，保加利亚面临着三年半以来的第七次大选，因此，保加利亚正变得越来越难以治理。【原文：Bulgaria is looking increasingly ungovernable after talks to forge a ruling coalition collapsed in early August, leaving the country facing its seventh general election in three and a half years.】

item.title: BCA 研究策略师称新兴市场股票将下跌 20
item.description: 一位曾正确预测新兴市场股票在金融危机后十年表现不佳的策略师表示，由于美国经济疲软态势将持续，新兴市场股票正处于大跌的边缘。【原文：Emerging-markets stocks are on the cusp of a major selloff as US economic weakness is set to persist, according to a strategist who correctly predicted a decade of underperformance for the asset class in the wake of the financial crisis.】

item.title: 纽约市公交系统计划出售由豪宅税收支持的债务
item.description: 纽约市公交系统计划以其获得的房地产税为抵押进行借款，以帮助筹集 20 亿美元用于基础设施升级，这是与传统票箱信贷不同的新借款机制。【原文：New York City’s transit system plans to borrow against real estate taxes it receives to help raise $2 billion for infrastructure upgrades, creating a new borrowing mechanism that’s separate from its traditional farebox credit.】

item.title: 阿联酋穆巴达拉公司寻求改变欧洲初创企业以提高回报率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Investment Co. is taking an increasingly active approach to the European startups it backs as it seeks to improve returns, according to people familiar with the matter.】
